Addendum¶

The Fields¶

At present, each record of the mileage data set summarises

namenotes
Area Pay DivisionAwaiting details.
Claim Line Startthe claim start date.
Claim Line EndThe claim end date.
Engine SizeThe engine size of a vehicle. The unit of measure is cubic centimetres; it is quite possible that some values are litres.
Fuel TypeAt present, the options are: diesel, electric, hybrid, petrol, unleaded; or the cell is left empty. Note, petrol and unleaded both refer to unleaded petrol.
CO2 (Carbon Dioxide) EmissionsThe unit of measure is grams of carbon dioxide per kilometre (gCO2/km)
Business MileageUnit of measure: miles.
Business Rate HighThe upper boundary of the mileage rate; pence per mile.
Business Rate LowThe lower boundary of the mileage rate; pence per mile.
Business ValueThe amount paid; pound sterling.
Commute Miles
Not Undertaken		Unit of measure: miles.
Overtime MileageUnit of measure: miles.
Journey DetailsA journey's details. The text is akin to free text, albeit it seems a few national health service organisations might each have an underlying journey details recording pattern.
